######################################

#leader_trait_adaptable_2 #common trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_adaptable_2_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_adaptable_2 } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_adaptable_2
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = scientist ID = None }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_trigger = yes
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_adaptable }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = scientist ID = leader_trait_adaptable_2 }
		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_adaptable_2_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_adaptable_2 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_adaptable_2
		hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_adaptable_2 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_effect = yes
		}
    }
}

        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_agrarian_upbringing_2 } }

        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_trigger = yes

        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_agrarian_upbringing }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = scientist ID = leader_trait_agrarian_upbringing_2 }
		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_effect = yes }
    }
}

    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_meticulous }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = scientist ID = leader_trait_meticulous_2 }
		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_meticulous_2_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_meticulous_2 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_meticulous_2
		hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_meticulous_2 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_effect = yes
		}
    }
}

        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_engineering_focus_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_engineering_focus_3
		hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_engineering_focus_3 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_alt_effect = yes
		}
    }
}


#leader_trait_explorer_cloaking_focus_3 #veteran trait

    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_explorer_cloaking_focus_3 } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_explorer_cloaking_focus_3
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = scientist ID = subclass_scientist_explorer }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_explorer_cloaking_focus }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = scientist ID = leader_trait_explorer_cloaking_focus_3 }
		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_effect = yes }
    }

    }
}


#leader_trait_intemporal #destiny trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_intemporal_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_intemporal } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_intemporal
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = scientist ID = None }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_intemporal }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = scientist ID = leader_trait_intemporal }
		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_2_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_intemporal_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_intemporal }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_intemporal
		hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_intemporal }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_alt_2_effect = yes
		}
    }
}

xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_mediator_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_mediator } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_mediator

        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_mediator }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = scientist ID = leader_trait_mediator }
		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_2_effect = yes }
    }

        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_mediator }
    }

        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_mediator
		hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_mediator }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_alt_2_effect = yes
		}
    }

        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes

		}

		}

        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes

		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_2_effect = yes }

		}

    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_truth_seeker } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_truth_seeker
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = scientist ID = subclass_scientist_governor }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_truth_seeker }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = scientist ID = leader_trait_truth_seeker }
		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_2_effect = yes }
    }

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_truth_seeker }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_truth_seeker

            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_truth_seeker }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_alt_2_effect = yes
		}
    }

    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_xeno_cataloger } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_xeno_cataloger
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = scientist ID = subclass_scientist_explorer }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_xeno_cataloger }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = scientist ID = leader_trait_xeno_cataloger }
		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_2_effect = yes }
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_xeno_cataloger }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_xeno_cataloger
		hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_xeno_cataloger }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_alt_2_effect = yes
		}
    }
